content:
Sure, here's a revised version of the professional summary that highlights Christina's passion for HR and problem-solving skills:

---

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY

Passionate and driven HR professional with experience in problem-solving and helping others. Skilled in providing quality service and support to clients. Recently completed an Allstate Apprenticeship in AskHR, providing HR-related support to employees and their families. Knowledgeable in company policies and procedures, KB system navigation, and Cronos. Holds an AA degree from Kennedy King College and is pursuing a BA in HR/Accounting at Chicago State University.
